actions.in_committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Reported by the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs. H. Rept. 101-285.
Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 181.
Mr. Vento moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
The chair announced that a second on the motion to suspend the rules is not required.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.
Yeas and Nays were ordered. Further proceedings on the motion were postponed.
Considered as unfinished business.
On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: (2/3 required): 353 - 0 (Roll no. 290).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Johnston without amendment. With written report No. 101-202.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 374.
Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.
Cleared for White House.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Measure Signed in Senate.
Presented to President.
Signed by President.
Became Public Law No: 101-177.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands
Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: To redesignate a certain portion of the George Washington Memorial Parkway as the "Clara Barton Parkway".

summary.text: Designates a portion of the George Washington Memorial Parkway between Maryland and the District of Columbia as the Clara Barton Parkway.

titles.title: To redesignate a certain portion of the George Washington Memorial Parkway as the "Clara Barton Parkway".
